'''Slow-Cooked Bamboo Shoot Soup''' is a  [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Bamboo Shoot Soup]] with [[Zhongli]]. The [[recipe]] for Bamboo Shoot Soup is obtainable from [[Verr Goldet]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

Slow-Cooked Bamboo Shoot Soup restores '''34'''% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates '''980''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds. Like most foods, this cannot affect other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* To celebrate Zhongli's birthday, a [https://ys.mihoyo.com/main/news/detail/13126 real-life recipe] for Slow-Cooked Bamboo Shoot Soup was released on the Chinese official website.
** The real-life version simmers for two hours. Prep time isn't listed in the recipe.
* The following birthday mails included Slow-Cooked Bamboo Shoot Soup:
** [[Birthday/Zhongli#I Hope This Finds You Well|Zhongli's 2020 Birthday Mail]] (1 Slow-Cooked Bamboo Shoot Soup)
** [[Birthday/Zhongli#Year's End.|Zhongli's 2021 Birthday Mail]] (1 Slow-Cooked Bamboo Shoot Soup)
